original_text: “Son of man, because Tyre has said of Jerusalem, ‘Aha! The gate to the nations is broken, and its doors have swung open to me; now that she lies in ruins I will prosper,’
korean_text: 인자야 두로가 예루살렘에 관하여 이르기를 아하 만민의 문이 깨져서 내게로 돌아왔도다 그가 황폐하였으니 내가 충만함을 얻으리라 하였도다

sentences.original_text: because Tyre has said of Jerusalem,
The gate to the nations is broken,
and its doors have swung open to me;
sentences.korean_translation: 그 문들이 나를 향하여 활짝 열렸으니

sentences.original_text: now that she lies in ruins
